name: GameStonks (n8_gdev)
description:
PLAY DESKTOP VERSION, it has background sync with music!

This is a mini game project I developed. I am a game developer and this is my first project. It is a classic 2D action platformer boss-fight. I welcome any suggestion and constructive criticism.

What to do:

0. PLAY FULL SCREEN (Still having problems to solve on itch)

1. Don't get hit by GME stocks thrown at you

2. Pick them when they are on the ground

3. Throw them rockets back at the evil edge founder to hurt him!

4. Win the Fight!

Controls:

- Arrows to move

- E to pick/throw squares

- Shift to slide (In air to!)

- Space to (double)jump

I hope you enjoy!
